scripts.package-linux: rm -rf .package.tmp && mkdir .package.tmp && cp -rf public package.json electron-main.js .package.tmp/. && electron-packager .package.tmp DN-Tool-Packager --overwrite --platform=linux --arch=x64 && rm -rf .package.tmp
scripts.package-darwin: rm -rf .package.tmp && mkdir .package.tmp && cp -rf public package.json electron-main.js .package.tmp/. && electron-packager .package.tmp DN-Tool-Packager --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && rm -rf .package.tmp
scripts.package-win32: rm -rf .package.tmp && mkdir .package.tmp && cp -rf public package.json electron-main.js .package.tmp/. && electron-packager .package.tmp DN-Tool-Packager --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && rm -rf .package.tmp
